Title: AI ML Engineer
Description:
Descripción





Get ready. Because you’re about to embark on an AI mission to revolutionise small business and accounting practices.

Sage Copilot isn’t just an AI-powered tool. We’re developing a game changer. A tool that will help customers streamline their tasks, boost their efficiency, and unlock new opportunities. Making it a trusted business partner, the likes of which they’ve never seen.

And you’ll be at the forefront of its development, as part of a global team, who can’t wait to collaborate and innovate with you.

We’re working on a truly groundbreaking product. So, is this your next technology job? No—that doesn’t do it justice. This is the future realised—for you, for our customers, and for the shape of technology as we’ve dreamed it.

We are seeking a talented and motivated A.I. Engineer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have experience in programming, artificial intelligence, machine learning and data science.

This is a hybrid role - three days per week in our Barcelona office.

Responsabilidades principales What you'll be doing:

Teamwork: work within a team to build and maintain cloud-based solutions to support Sage’s business plans and long-term objectives by contributing to our state-of-the-art cloud architecture.

Innovation and Technology: Leverage emerging technologies to innovate and improve the Sage Copilot implementation. Stay abreast of industry trends and incorporate best practices into the workstream.

Architecture and Framework: contribute to the architectural design and implementation of Sage Copilot, ensuring it meets scalability, security, and performance standards.

Collaborating: with external teams to integrate provided frameworks effectively.

Knowledge sharing: Share knowledge to help upskill wider teams on how AI technologies can be leveraged in our products. Foster a culture of continuous learning and development to ensure your skills remain cutting-edge.

Performance and Security: Monitor and optimize quality and performance whilst ensuring security protocols are followed.

Requirements:


Strong software engineering fundamentals and experience in designing, developing, and testing software applications.
Solid understanding of AI/ML principles and algorithms, particularly in areas relevant to Natural Language Processing and content generation.
Experience with Large Language Models (LLMs), including their architecture, capabilities, and limitations. Familiarity with platforms like AWS Bedrock (Anthropic Claude, etc.) is beneficial.
Proficiency in Python.
Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS) and related services.
Understanding of API design and development.
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills to tackle complex technical challenges.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills in English to work effectively with diverse teams.
Curiosity and a passion for AI and innovation.

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Hola Consultores S.L. somos una empresa especializada en la provisión de Servicios TIC e Ingeniería para la gestión empresarial. Trabajamos diseñando soluciones a medida de las necesidades de nuestros clientes.




Nos enorgullece ser una empresa 2.0 innovadora donde las personas son el centro de nuestra atención. La ética, transparencia, imparcialidad e independencia son valores fundamentales en nuestra filosofía, y también estamos comprometidos con la igualdad de género. Nos esforzamos por garantizar oportunidades equitativas para hombres y mujeres en todas las áreas de nuestro trabajo. Además, estamos firmemente a favor de la igualdad en todas sus formas y promovemos un entorno inclusivo donde cada individuo, independientemente de su género, religión, orientación sexual, etnia o cualquier otra característica, sea valorado y respetado.




✈️ ¿Te apasiona la aviación y el poder de los datos?

¿Te gustaría aplicar tu experiencia en machine learning para resolver desafíos reales en uno de los sectores más dinámicos y de alto impacto?




Estamos buscando un/a Científico/a de Datos que disfrute trabajando donde se cruzan el big data, la tecnología en la nube y la estrategia de negocio.




🎯 Lo que buscamos para que tengas éxito en este rol:

Formación académica sólida: Doctorado o máster en disciplinas cuantitativas como Ingeniería, Informática, Física, Estadística u otras afines. Se valorará especialmente el conocimiento en Investigación Operativa.
Experiencia comprobada: Al menos 4 años trabajando en Ciencia de Datos, con dominio de técnicas estadísticas y un historial demostrado en la entrega de soluciones reales y de impacto.
Habilidades técnicas avanzadas: Manejo fluido de lenguajes de programación como Python o PySpark, y experiencia práctica con buenas prácticas de desarrollo: pruebas unitarias, revisiones de código y frameworks de big data.
Entorno cloud: Experiencia trabajando con plataformas en la nube como AWS y/o Azure.
Mentalidad de innovación: Conocimiento de técnicas de machine learning y deep learning. Tener experiencia con Inteligencia Artificial Generativa será un plus muy valorado.




✈️ Disponibilidad para viajar fuera de España.




¿Qué te podemos aportar?

Contrato laboral indefinido y estabilidad desde el primer día.
Todo nuestro apoyo para tu desarrollo personal/profesional.
Incorporación inmediata.
Modelo de teletrabajo híbrido.
Excelente clima laboral.
Seguro médico privado (completo + dental).
Pago del 100% exámenes de certificación oficial.




Si tu perfil se ajusta al puesto y estás emocionado/a en formar parte de nuestro equipo, ¡nos encantaría saber de ti! ¡Únete a nuestro equipo! ¡En Hola Consultores apostamos por ti!

Show more

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Organisation/Company: The Blue Box Biomedical Solutions Research Field: Engineering, Computer Science, Physics, Mathematics Researcher Profile: Other Profession Positions, Master Positions Country: Spain Application Deadline: 30 May 2025 - 23:59 (Europe/Paris) Type of Contract: Permanent Job Status: Full-time Hours Per Week: 40 Offer Starting Date: 1 Jun 2025 Is the job funded through the EU Research Framework Programme? Not funded by a EU programme Is the Job related to staff position within a Research Infrastructure? No Offer Description We are looking for a Data Scientist to join our dynamic team and spearhead the technical aspects of our breast cancer diagnostic device development. The ideal candidate will possess a strong technical background, a teamwork-oriented mindset, and a passion for driving innovation in healthcare. Job Description Lead improvements in AI algorithms based on processing and data analysis of clinical examinations gathered with the device, prioritizing sensitivity and specificity for challenging classes. Design and implement preprocessing pipelines: signal denoising, normalization, scaling, and feature extraction. Keep our comprehensive dataset up to date, addressing data scarcity challenges. Lead troubleshooting efforts and provide technical expertise to resolve complex issues encountered during the development of AI models. Collaborate with our Head of Engineering and Clinical Lead in optimizing the quality of data readings obtained with our device. Collaborate with our QA/RA Lead to ensure that all technical aspects of the AI algorithm development adhere to quality standards, regulatory requirements, and industry best practices. About the team This is an in-person job with one optional work-from-home day per week. Our office space is at StartUB! (Barcelona). The current team is integrated by 8 people: CEO, Tech Lead, Operations Lead, Clinical Lead, QA/RA Manager, Project Manager, Lab Technician, Software Engineer. Where to apply E-mail: ****** Requirements Research Field: Mathematics Education Level: Master Degree or equivalent Research Field: Computer Science » Programming Education Level: Master Degree or equivalent Skills/Qualifications Advanced Degree in Computer Science, bioinformatics, physics, mathematics or related field. Proven track record of hands-on experience (=3 years), ideally in the development of algorithms of pre-processing codes to classify multidimensional time series data, preferably in the field of biology. Experience in cross-validation strategies and handling class imbalance. (Bonus) Knowledge of electronics and sensor signal acquisition. Strong collaborative mindset, open to iterative model refinement based on feedback from engineers and clinicians. Ability to communicate technical concepts clearly to non-technical teams (e.g., Quality and Regulatory Office, Clinical Office). J-18808-Ljbffr

Title: Product Data Scientist (They/She/He)
Description:
If you’re here, it’s because you’re looking for an exciting ride.

A ride that will fuel up your ambitions to take on a new challenge and stretch yourself beyond your comfort zone.

We’ll deliver a non-vanilla culture built on talent, where we work to amplify the impact on millions of people, paving the way forward together.

Not your usual app. We are the fastest-growing multi-category app connecting millions of users with businesses, and couriers, offering on-demand services from more than 170,000 local restaurants, grocers and supermarkets, and high street retail stores. We operate in more than 1500 cities across 23 countries.

Together we revolutionise the way people connect with their everyday needs, from delivering essentials to connecting our ecosystem of users through innovative solutions powered by technology. For us, every day is filled with purpose.

What makes our ride unique?

🤝 Our culture and strong values.

💪 Our career development philosophy.

🤝 Our commitment to being a force for good.

We have a vision: Building the largest marketplace in your city, to give access to anything in minutes. And this is where your ride starts.

YOUR MISSION

Support the development of logistics features, quantifying the impact that they might bring to the company, supporting the design process with data to make decisions, coordinating the rollout of features, and measuring their impact.

THE JOURNEY


Work closely with product and operations teams to define the product roadmap and strategy, monitor and give visibility of product metrics and KPIs.
Apply data analytics and statistical techniques (e.g. A/B testing, multivariate testing, clustering) to uncover insights,validate product hypotheses and solve business problems that drive the highest impact.
Translate product questions and hypotheses into structured analyses that drive clear, actionable outcomes
Develop and maintain scalable and self-service visualization tools and storytelling dashboards.
Owning everything analytics end to end in the product development cycle, from ideation and opportunity sizing, to experimentation and post-launch impact analyses.
Define feature optimization strategies by analyzing usage patterns and tailoring recommendations for each geography.
Build robust relationships with stakeholders acting as a strategic and supportive link between the technology,business and product.


What You Will Bring To The Ride


1-3 years of professional experience outside of an academic and internship setting, in a quantitative analysis role, preferably in product facing teams
Knowledge or experience in digital product development
Experience with an application of statistical modeling and advanced analytics to provide product-shaping insights
Excellent SQL skills and experience applying those on-the-job; you know how to join multiple tables, you know how and when to use CTEs, and you use aggregate functions to come up with relevant statistics
Solid proficiency in programming (Python/R) and experience working with popular tools such as Pandas, SciPy, Seaborn, Jupyter/iPython notebooks, R Markdown.
Knowledgeable and preferably experienced in designing and analyzing experiments in digital products (A/B test, multivariate, etc)
Knowledge of visualization tools like Tableau, Looker, Qlikview.
Excellent spoken and written English.


Individuals representing diverse profiles, and abilities, encompassing various genders, ethnicities, and backgrounds, are less likely to apply for this role if they do not possess solid experience in 100% of these areas. Even if it seems you don't meet our musts don't let it stop you, we are all about finding the best talent out there! Skills can be learned, and embracing diversity is invaluable.

We Believe Driven Talent Deserves


🌟 An enticing equity plan that lets you own a piece of the action.
💪 Top-notch private health insurance to keep you at your peak.
🍔 Monthly Glovo credit to satisfy your cravings!
💳 Discounts on transportation, food, and even kindergarten expenses.
🏊 Discounted gym memberships to keep you energized.
🏖️ Extra time off, the freedom to work from home two days a week, and the opportunity to work from anywhere for up to three weeks a year!
👪 Enhanced parental leave, and office-based nursery.
🧠 Online therapy and wellbeing benefits to ensure your mental well-being.


Here at Glovo, we thrive on diversity, we believe it enhances our teams, products, and culture. We know that the best ideas come from a mashup of brilliant diverse minds. This is why we are committed to providing equal opportunities to talent from all backgrounds - all genders, racial/diverse backgrounds, abilities, ages, sexual orientations and all other unique characteristics that make you YOU. We will encourage you to bring your authentic self to work, fostering an inclusive environment where everyone feels heard.

Feel free to note your pronouns in your application (e.g., she/her/hers, he/him/his, they/them/theirs, etc).

So, ready to take the wheel and make this the ride of your life?

Delve into our culture by taking a peek at our Instagram and check out our Linkedin and website!
Show more
HTML:
If you’re here, it’s because you’re looking for an exciting ride.

A ride that will fuel up your ambitions to take on a new challenge and stretch yourself beyond your comfort zone.

We’ll deliver a non-vanilla culture built on talent, where we work to amplify the impact on millions of people, paving the way forward together.

Not your usual app. We are the fastest-growing multi-category app connecting millions of users with businesses, and couriers, offering on-demand services from more than 170,000 local restaurants, grocers and supermarkets, and high street retail stores. We operate in more than 1500 cities across 23 countries.

Together we revolutionise the way people connect with their everyday needs, from delivering essentials to connecting our ecosystem of users through innovative solutions powered by technology. For us, every day is filled with purpose.

What makes our ride unique?

🤝 Our culture and strong values.

💪 Our career development philosophy.

🤝 Our commitment to being a force for good.

We have a vision: Building the largest marketplace in your city, to give access to anything in minutes. And this is where your ride starts.

YOUR MISSION

Support the development of logistics features, quantifying the impact that they might bring to the company, supporting the design process with data to make decisions, coordinating the rollout of features, and measuring their impact.

THE JOURNEY

  • Work closely with product and operations teams to define the product roadmap and strategy, monitor and give visibility of product metrics and KPIs.
  • Apply data analytics and statistical techniques (e.g. A/B testing, multivariate testing, clustering) to uncover insights,validate product hypotheses and solve business problems that drive the highest impact.
  • Translate product questions and hypotheses into structured analyses that drive clear, actionable outcomes
  • Develop and maintain scalable and self-service visualization tools and storytelling dashboards.
  • Owning everything analytics end to end in the product development cycle, from ideation and opportunity sizing, to experimentation and post-launch impact analyses.
  • Define feature optimization strategies by analyzing usage patterns and tailoring recommendations for each geography.
  • Build robust relationships with stakeholders acting as a strategic and supportive link between the technology,business and product.

What You Will Bring To The Ride

  • 1-3 years of professional experience outside of an academic and internship setting, in a quantitative analysis role, preferably in product facing teams
  • Knowledge or experience in digital product development
  • Experience with an application of statistical modeling and advanced analytics to provide product-shaping insights
  • Excellent SQL skills and experience applying those on-the-job; you know how to join multiple tables, you know how and when to use CTEs, and you use aggregate functions to come up with relevant statistics
  • Solid proficiency in programming (Python/R) and experience working with popular tools such as Pandas, SciPy, Seaborn, Jupyter/iPython notebooks, R Markdown.
  • Knowledgeable and preferably experienced in designing and analyzing experiments in digital products (A/B test, multivariate, etc)
  • Knowledge of visualization tools like Tableau, Looker, Qlikview.
  • Excellent spoken and written English.

Individuals representing diverse profiles, and abilities, encompassing various genders, ethnicities, and backgrounds, are less likely to apply for this role if they do not possess solid experience in 100% of these areas. Even if it seems you don't meet our musts don't let it stop you, we are all about finding the best talent out there! Skills can be learned, and embracing diversity is invaluable.

We Believe Driven Talent Deserves

  • 🌟 An enticing equity plan that lets you own a piece of the action.
  • 💪 Top-notch private health insurance to keep you at your peak.
  • 🍔 Monthly Glovo credit to satisfy your cravings!
  • 💳 Discounts on transportation, food, and even kindergarten expenses.
  • 🏊 Discounted gym memberships to keep you energized.
  • 🏖️ Extra time off, the freedom to work from home two days a week, and the opportunity to work from anywhere for up to three weeks a year!
  • 👪 Enhanced parental leave, and office-based nursery.
  • 🧠 Online therapy and wellbeing benefits to ensure your mental well-being.

Here at Glovo, we thrive on diversity, we believe it enhances our teams, products, and culture. We know that the best ideas come from a mashup of brilliant diverse minds. This is why we are committed to providing equal opportunities to talent from all backgrounds - all genders, racial/diverse backgrounds, abilities, ages, sexual orientations and all other unique characteristics that make you YOU. We will encourage you to bring your authentic self to work, fostering an inclusive environment where everyone feels heard.

Feel free to note your pronouns in your application (e.g., she/her/hers, he/him/his, they/them/theirs, etc).

So, ready to take the wheel and make this the ride of your life?

Delve into our culture by taking a peek at our Instagram and check out our Linkedin and website!

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
¿Te apasiona la ciencia de datos y el desarrollo de soluciones analíticas? 👀




➥ Unirte a Innova, es formar parte de una empresa de consultoría líder a nivel nacional y en pleno desarrollo internacional. Si estás interesado en participar en proyectos innovadores de IA, Cloud Computing y Transformación Digital, creemos este es tu lugar. 🤝




En Innova-tsn buscamos incorporar profesionales con 3 años de experiencia en proyectos de ciencia de datos y modelización avanzada, para reforzar nuestro equipo en diferentes sectores como energía, retail, banca y más.




📌 ¿Qué buscamos?




Experiencia como Data Scientist de al menos 3 años en desarrollo y mantenimiento de modelos.
Conocimiento avanzado de técnicas de tratamiento y preparación de datos y analítica descriptiva.
Conocimiento del desarrollo, mantenimiento y monitorización de modelos de Machine Learning (Regresión, Clustering, XGBoost, Random Forest….) y técnicas de Forecasting.
Conocimiento avanzado de los lenguajes Python y R.
Estudios mínimos: Licenciatura/Grado en Matemáticas, Estadística, Ingeniería, Físicas, Económicas…




✅ ...es un plus!

Buen nivel en SAS y PySpark.
Perfil matemático con habilidades técnicas en el entorno de datos.




📈 ¿Qué valoramos?




Máster en Data Science, Machine Learning, Inteligencia Artificial.
Experiencia en Desarrollo de Redes Neuronales en frameworks como Keras, Pytorch, TensorFlow.
Conocimiento/experiencia de algoritmos de Optimización.
Experiencia en el desarrollo en entornos colaborativos (Github, Gitlab).
Experiencia en MLOps.
Conocimiento de LLMs: Técnicas de Prompt Engineering, RAG y Fine tuning.
·Experiencia /certificación en plataformas Cloud (AWS, Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud) tanto en el desarrollo como el despliegue de modelos.
Nivel avanzado de inglés.
Habilidad para trabajar en equipo y aportar en entornos colaborativos.




👋 ¿Qué te ofrecemos nosotros?




Contrato indefinido, invertimos y buscamos tu desarrollo a largo plazo.
Formaciones en plataformas e internas, y certificaciones oficiales a cargo de la empresa.
Planes de carrera personalizados, adaptados a tus fortalezas e intereses y basados en evaluaciones de desempeño anuales.
Beneficios sociales: seguro médico de cobertura completa.
Retribución flexible: ticket guardería y ticket restaurant.
Ser parte de un equipo especializado en soluciones empresariales y arquitectura de datos.




En Innova, fomentamos mucho el desarrollo del talento, la creatividad y el trabajo en equipo. Invertimos en espacios, tecnologías y herramientas para que los que componen nuestra compañía profundicen en sus habilidades, exploren nuevas áreas y se sientan una pieza fundamental.




Si estás buscando un lugar donde impulsar y desarrollar tu carrera profesional, únete a nosotros y sé parte de este equipo innovador 🤓

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
¿Eres un/a apasionad@ del dato y te interesa seguir

desarrollando tu carrera como Principle Data Scientist en proyectos estables?




Nuestro Cliente:

Randstad Digital es la empresa de consultoría tecnológica del grupo Randstad especializada en servicios tecnológicos estables. Estamos presentes en más de 20 mercados y contamos con más de 25.000 especialistas a nivel global y a nivel nacional con más de 400 y tenemos oficinas en Madrid, Barcelona, Valencia, Sevilla, Zaragoza, Bilbao y Valladolid. Ofrecemos una amplia gama de servicios y soluciones tecnológicas para empresas de diferentes sectores: Banca, Seguros, Industria, Telecomunicaciones, Media, Digital, Aeronáutica, Automoción, Servicios y Administraciones públicas.




Tus Funciones:

Se busca gente que busque socios y estructura en datos.

Puede organizar los datos que puede consumir el peaje IA.

Sacar los datos, organizarlos y luego ver cómo la IA puede funcionar con ellos.

Crear valor a partir de los datos.




Requisitos:

Formación: Ingeniero Superior
Conocimientos: data science, machine learning, ia
Experiencia: 3 a 5 años
Inglés C2
IA
Machine learning




Tus Beneficios:

¿A qué esperas para formar parte de nuestro gran equipo Randstad Digital?, aquí encontrarás motivos para ello: PLAN DE FORMACIÓN CONTINUA, plan de formación anual, acceso a plataforma elearning de formación técnica, plataforma de formación en habilidades¿ ACOMPAÑAMIENTO Y PLAN DE CARRERA, Tendrás un referente de Randstad Digital cerca de ti en todo momento. CONCILIACIÓN, Sabemos que tu vida personal es tan importante como la profesional por eso podrás disfrutar de 23 días de vacaciones y en la mayoría de nuestros proyectos tendrás un horario flexible. COMPROMISO y ESTABILIDAD, Incorporación a empresa en continuo crecimiento que apuesta por las nuevas tecnologías. SALARIO COMPETITIVO acorde a tu experiencia profesional. CONDICIONES contractuales competitivas, Plan de retribución flexible (tarjeta restaurante y cheques guardería) y Randstad Care, plataforma de ofertas y descuentos exclusivos.PLAN TRÁETE UN AMIG@, si nos ayudas a incrementar el equipo, te premiaremos con una compensación económica.Se garantiza la confidencialidad en el proceso de selección.¿Tienes ganas y te ves preparado/a para asumir un nuevo reto como el nuestro?¡Te estamos esperando!https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZpazhoepZ4







¿por qué con randstad digital?

En Randstad Digital estamos enfocados en ayudarte a encontrar el puesto de trabajo que mejor se adapte a ti y a tus expectativas.




Sabemos que los perfiles profesionales IT son unos de los más demandados en el mercado laboral actual. Randstad Digital somos una división encargada de la selección profesional y especializada de perfiles IT tanto para su contratación directa como para su contratación temporal.

Usamos nuestra propia metodología de análisis y selección que nos permite garantizarte un puesto de trabajo 100% ajustado a tu perfil profesional.

Además estamos siempre cerca de ti, realizamos un seguimiento personalizado de tu incorporación para facilitarte la adaptación a tu nuevo puesto de trabajo. Y hacemos uso de nuestra tecnología para brindarte una experiencia excelente en tu búsqueda de empleo, proceso de selección y como trabajador.

¿A qué estás esperando?

Apúntate a nuestras ofertas y encuentra el empleo que buscas.




#somosRSC

Randstad promueve la equidad de oportunidades laborales a través de equipos diversos e inclusivos. Por ello, en nuestros procesos, garantizamos la inserción de todas las personas independientemente de su condición personal, género, orientación sexual, etnia, cultura, edad, religión o discapacidad.




#compromisoNetZero

Randstad fomenta la reducción de su impacto medioambiental para hacer de su entorno un lugar mejor para todas las personas. Nuestro compromiso con la iniciativa Science Based Targets (SBTi), cuyos objetivos están basados en la ciencia, promueven la ambición de Randstad de ser Net Zero en 2050.

Title: ML Engineer
Description:
Appodeal is a dynamic US-based product company with a truly global presence.

We have offices in Warsaw, Barcelona and Virginia along with remote team members located around the world.

Our company thrives on diversity, collaboration, and innovation, making us a leader in the mobile app monetization space.

Why Appodeal?

At Appodeal, we're more than just a company—we're a team united by a common mission: to help every person discover and grow their talents!

We take pride in our cutting-edge product and our internationally dispersed team of talented professionals.

Here's what we value, and what we hope you do too:


Continuous Learning and Growth: We are passionate about learning, growing personally, and building rewarding careers.
Making an Impact: We are committed to building a history-defining company that leaves a lasting impact on the mobile app industry.
Solving Exciting Challenges: We tackle complex problems every day, supported by a team of world-class professionals and mentors.
Enjoying the Journey: We believe in having fun while working toward our goals.


We are seeking an ML Engineer to take ownership of deploying and maintaining all machine-learning models in production at BidMachine. This role is pivotal in shaping how we scale our data-driven bidding strategies and enhance system performance. You will collaborate with Data Scientists, DevOps, and Backend Engineers to implement robust pipelines, optimize model performance in real-time environments, and ensure the integrity and observability of our models in production.

Responsibilities:


Lead the transition of all current ML models (prototype, research-grade, or sandboxed) into a scalable production environment.
Design and maintain end-to-end model deployment pipelines, from training to serving, using tools like Docker, Kubernetes, and cloud services (GCP, AWS, or similar). Implement model versioning, A/B testing, rollback mechanisms, and performance monitoring.
Optimize models for latency, scalability, and throughput, especially in real-time bidding contexts.
Collaborate with data scientists to refactor research code into clean, production-grade code.
Ensure observability and monitoring of deployed models (e.g., Prometheus, Grafana, or similar).
Establish and maintain ML Ops best practices, including CI/CD for ML, feature stores, and reproducibility standards.


Qualifications:


3+ years of experience in ML Engineering, ML Ops, or Software Engineering roles focusing on deploying machine learning models.
Proficiency in Python and frameworks such as PyTorch, CatBoost, XGBoost, Scikit-Learn, and others.
Experience with ONNX or other analogous technologies to deploy ML models in production environments
Experience with containerization (Docker) and orchestration tools (Kubernetes). Deep understanding of cloud infrastructure (e.g., AWS SageMaker, GCP Vertex AI, etc.).
Knowledge of real-time or low-latency systems and performance optimization.
Strong collaboration and communication skills to partner with cross-functional teams.


Nice to haves:


Experience with Rust for high-performance, low-latency ML serving or systems integration.
Experience with Java/Scala for integrating ML models into backend code.
Experience in AdTech, real-time bidding (RTB), or high-frequency decision systems.
Familiarity with feature stores, model registries, and data versioning.
Exposure to Kafka, Airflow, Spark, or similar distributed data processing tools.


With an outstanding product and a mission that excites and inspires, Appodeal offers a unique opportunity to make an impact while being part of an amazing team.

Join us and help shape the future of mobile app success!

Title: DATA SCIENTIST AND MACHINE LEARNING ENGINEER (Industry & Logistics)
Description:
EURECAT

Eurecat is the second Research & Technology Organisation in Spain and one of the largest applied research and technology transfer organisation in Southern

Europe. It brings together the experience of more than 800 professionals who generate an annual turnover of 69 million euros and provides services to more than 2,000 companies. Eurecat integrates advanced digital capabilities and experience in biotechnology, industry and sustainability and collaborates with industry in R+D+I activities and projects, offering advanced scientific and technological services and specialized knowledge to respond effectively to the technological needs of very different business sectors, accelerating innovation, reducing both risks and spendings on scientific and technological infrastructures. The technology center participates in more than 200 large national and international consortium projects of high strategic R&I, has 230 patents and 10 spin-offs. Eurecat has eleven centers in Catalonia and presence in Madrid, Malaga and Chile.

Job Description

Eurecat is the main Research & Technology Organisation in Catalonia and the second largest private research organization in southern Europe. It brings together the experience of more than 800 professionals and provides services to more than 2,000 companies. Applied R&D, technological services, highly specialized training, technological consultancy or valorisation and exploitation of industrial property are some of the services that Eurecat offers for both large and small and medium-sized enterprises in all sectors. The technology centre participates in more than 200 large national and international consortium projects of high strategic R&I and has 181 patents and 10 spin-offs. The added value provided by Eurecat accelerates innovation, reduces spending on scientific and technological infrastructures, reduces risks and provides specialized knowledge tailored to each company.

Job Description

Are you ready to embark on a challenging journey of discovering and applying novel Machine Learning and AI-driven solutions in process monitoring, control and optimization for products in different industrial sectors? The Applied Artificial Intelligence Unit of EURECAT is looking for a highly motivated Data Scientist and Machine Learning engineer to help us pave the way in transforming products and industries to create a smarter, more sustainable future.


Whether it’s algorithms or data analytics, we’re here to revolutionize the industrial sector.
Enriching product functionalities by developing cutting edge data driven solutions
Industrial Control Systems: from single automation devices to complex machines, we’re exploring AI-based approaches across various levels of industrial control systems: Computer vision, Sensor fusion, model predictive control, self-optimizing processes, surrogate modelling, LLM, etc.
Collaboration: Join our multidisciplinary team. Learn, grow, and contribute. Be part of the ML-driven industrial revolution.


RESPONSABILITIES

As a valued member of our team, your role encompasses several critical dimensions:


Code Craftsmanship: Your code will be the bedrock of our innovations. Rigorous validation and refinement ensure optimal efficiency and ready-to market solutions
Innovative Solutions: You’ll delve into the intricate world of data-driven solutions, harnessing the power of multimodal data across industrial contexts.
GenAI: Large Language Models will change how we interact with data driven solutions, be part of the Agents era for industrial applications
Modelling industrial settings require novel approaches. Be ready to work with GNNs and PINNs
TimeSeries analytics: Expect to wield advanced tools like Recurrent Neural Networks and Autoencoders.
Global Impact: Collaborate on scientific publications, sharing your insights with the wider research community.
Tailored Growth: We recognize your unique strengths and interests. Your responsibilities will evolve accordingly, fostering personalized development within our team.
Project Leadership: As you grow and the projects unfold, your adept project management skills will steer us toward success.


WHAT EURECAT CAN OFFER YOU?

Our group is specialized in applied research and development on ML and AI solutions. The Applied Artificial Intelligence Unit of Eurecat develops innovative solutions (algorithms, methods, platforms) based on a combination of artificial intelligence and knowledge management technologies, especially for the industrial, energy and sustainability sectors. We have over 12 years of experience pushing the adoption of state-of-the-art AI and ML solutions for our private customers as well as for relevant European research projects! Check out our portfolio: Applied Artificial Intelligence - Eurecat (applied-artificial-intelligence-eurecat.github.io) Applied Artificial Intelligence Eurecat Technological Centre

And …


Permanent contract
Hybrid (work home office/work in the office)
Flexible Schedule
Shorter workday on Friday and Summer Schedule
Flexible remuneration package (health insurance, transport, lunch, studies - training and kindergarten)
Eurecat workers can join the Eurecat Academy courses
Eurecat workers can attend to our weekly thematic sessions to be aware of Eurecat areas of knowledge.
Language’s training (English, Catalan and Spanish)
Company's commitment to work-life balance


Requirements

REQUIRED SKILLS


A passion for DataScience and ML, backed by an MSc or equivalent experience in ML, AI, Computer Vision, or a related field.
Excellent coding skills. Your code will be used in ready-to-market AI applications.
Proficiency in Python.
At least 2 years of hands-on experience with Machine Learning, Deep Learning, with a track record of applying AI techniques.
Open minded: Eager to learn new domains: how the industrial processes work and its fine details.
A collaborative and growing mindset, coupled with the ability to thrive both independently and as part of a team.
Dynamic communication skills, allowing you to effectively convey complex ideas and collaborate with colleagues from diverse backgrounds.
Flexibility, creativity, and a relentless drive to innovate.
Critical thinking.
A readiness to travel when needed, embracing opportunities to connect with clients, partners, and collaborators worldwide.
Show more

Title: AI Lab - Junior Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Job Summary

The AI Lab is responsible for bringing state-of-the-art research in Generative AI (and AI in general) to the Personal Systems (PS) product portfolio to solve top user needs and enable all new type of user experiences. The team will be in two main locations: Sant Cugat (ESP) and Palo Alto (US).

The AI Lab goal is to operationalize the Gen AI model lifecycle, build models to support the top initiatives within Personal Systems, and do research on Generative AI. We are looking for a Jr Machine Learning Engineer with expertise and passion in the Gen AI space.

Responsibilities


Help execute the technical strategy of the AI Lab with the goal of supporting HP ambitious AI roadmap.
Support the application of new of processes and standards to ensure that the teams are building high quality and safe models.
Develop tooling to support the model lifecycle and encourages the use of best practices.
Adopts state-of-the-art Gen AI modeling and evaluation techniques.
Help develop strategic engineering proof of concepts in the Gen AI space.


What are we looking for?


Four-year Degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Data Science, or any other related discipline or commensurate work experience or demonstrated competence. Master related to Generative AI would be a plus.
Exposure to Gen AI in previous projects / internships.
Between 0 - 2 years of work experience, internships related to the job content would also be valuable.


Knowledge & Skills


Finetuning of LLMs
Software development
Programming languages (e.g, Python, C++, Java)


Cross-Org Skills


Effective Communication
Results Orientation
Learning Agility
Digital Fluency


What We Offer


Opportunity to work in an international organization with colleagues coming from all over the world.
Diverse, continued internal growth and career opportunities. Including HP’s own learning platform and LinkedIn Learning.
An attractive benefits package:
Health & Life insurance.
Lunch at reduced prices at our canteen/ ticket restaurant vouchers.
HP product discount.
Work life balance / flexible working hours.
Women, Pride, Young employees, Sustainability and DisAbility! Just a few of our fantastic global business networks you can get involved with locally.
We also dedicate time and resources to contribute with our community through Corporate Volunteering activities, including our onsite HP Charity day.
Do you like to give back to the community? Then join one of our many volunteering teams or be a part of the incredible HP charity day held on site annually.
Love sports? Then take advantage of our sports center (indoor and outdoor) with 25+ regular coordinated activities.
We have an onsite Doctor and medical team for our employees, including services such as: nutrition, physiotherapy, and general health.
Printing Happy hour – from photographs to large posters. And Hands-on workshops to print with the latest technology – from wall covers to 3D printed models.
Our Women Network organizes activities such as Networking, the promotion of STEM vocations, talks on, improving business acumen, work life balance and skills of the future, etc.

Sounds like you? Apply and let’s have a talk!
Show more

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Job Description

At Levi Strauss & Co, we are revolutionising the apparel business and redefining the way denim is made. We are taking one of the world’s most iconic brands into the next century: from creating machine learning-powered denim finishes to using block-chain for our factory workers’ wellbeing, to building algorithms to better meet the needs of our consumers and optimize our supply chain.

Be a pioneer in the fashion industry by joining our Digital and Technology organization where you will have the chance to build exciting solutions that will impact our global business and at the be part of large and diverse data community.

The Data Science, analytics and AI team at Levi’s is responsible of building data-driven solutions that improve our existing business processes in multiple areas across supply chain, retail, revenue management and ecommerce, among others. The team is responsible for the end-to-end solution development from data ingestion until operationalisation of models in production. As a Machine Learning Engineer within this org, you will work alongside Data Scientists, Analysts, ML engineers and product management to operationalise our ML models in production on a broad set of domains, powering a data-driven transformation of our standard business procedures across channels and organizations. You will develop and deploy novel approaches to optimize existing machine learning systems to maximise their value and increase consumer satisfaction at every brand touchpoint. We need someone who will bring thoughtful solutions, perspective, empathy, creativity, and a positive attitude to solve the different challenges in our business.

You are a team player, always willing to work alongside and support your colleagues, you have a proactive and self-driven mindset towards problem-solving, looking to take on challenges and the opportunity to grow, and you are able to effectively balance solution vs risk taking.

Key Responsibilities


Work with data scientists , analysts, ML engineers and product management to create and deploy new models and ML systems.
Implement end-to-end solutions across the full breadth of ML model development lifecycle. The specific role includes working hand in hand with the scientists from the point of data exploration for model development to the point of building features, ML pipelines and deploying them in production. You will have an opportunity to work on both batch and real time models. The role also involves operational support.
Identify new opportunities to improve existing solutions towards greater accuracy and/or efficiency
Establish scalable, efficient, automated processes for data analyses, model development, validation and implementation
Write efficient and scalable software to ship products in an iterative, continual-release environment
Write optimized data pipelines to support machine learning models
Contribute to and promote good software engineering practices across the team and build cloud native software for ML pipelines
Contribute to and re-use community best practices


Example Projects


Besides driving the transformation of Levi's into a data-driven enterprise in general, here are some specific projects you will work on and contribute to:
Pricing elasticity modelling and pricing recommendations
Promotional campaigns optimization and discounts recommendations
Analytics solutions to support revenue management activities


About You


University or advanced degree in engineering, computer science, mathematics, or a related field
3+ years' experience developing and deploying machine learning systems into production
Expertise in data engineering, analysis and processing (e.g. designing and maintaining ETLs, validating data and detecting quality issues)
Previous experience developing predictive models in a production environment, MLOps and model integration into larger scale applications.
Experience working with big data tools: Spark, Hadoop, Kafka, etc.
Experience with at least one cloud provider solution (AWS, GCP, Azure) and understanding of serverless code development. GCP experience preferred.
Efficiency with object-oriented/object function scripting languages, Python required.
Efficiency with Python data-handling libraries like Pandas or Pyspark.
Efficiency in SQL for data consumption and transformation. Nice to have: SparkSQL, BigQuery SQL dialects.
Expertise in standard software engineering methodology, e.g. unit testing, test automation, continuous integration, continuous deployment, code reviews, design documentation
Working experience with native ML orchestration systems such as Kubeflow, Vertex AI Pipelines, Airflow, TFX...
Relevant working experience with Docker and Kubernetes is a big plus.


LOCATION

Barcelona, Spain

FULL TIME/PART TIME

Full time

Current LS&Co Employees, apply via your Workday account.
Show more

Current LS&Co Employees, apply via your Workday account.

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
¿Te apasiona el BigData? ¿Quieres formar parte de un equipo con una de las trayectorias más solventes en el mundo del Machine Learning, Analytics y BigData? ¿Te apetece trabajar en una compañía joven, participativa y especializada?




Para ello solo exigimos un requisito, que tus respuestas a las preguntas anteriores hayan sido: ¡SÍ!

En Mática Partners, trabajamos continuamente para mantenernos a la vanguardia tecnológica, y además somos una empresa People Centric, ponemos al trabajador en el centro de todo lo que hacemos. Creemos en una cultura horizontal, sin egos, en un entorno donde se valoran tanto las ideas como las personas.




Buscamos a un/a Data Scientist con 2,5 años de experiencia en análisis de datos, apasionado/a por extraer insights y construir modelos de Machine Learning.




¿Qué buscamos?

Experiencia sólida en Python y PySpark.
Experiencia demostrada en Time Series Forecasting.
Buen dominio en Databricks.
Experiencia trabajando con Git y buenas prácticas de control de versiones.
Alto nivel de inglés, tanto oral como escrito.
Se valorará positivamente experiencia con Azure, CI/CD, Test Unitarios.




¿Cómo será tu día a día?

Comenzarás cada jornada con una reunión diaria de seguimiento de proyecto donde compartirás avances, bloqueos y próximos pasos con el equipo.
Tendrás autonomía para organizar tu trabajo, gestionando tus tareas y tiempos de forma flexible, con foco en la entrega de valor y resultados.
Participarás en reuniones de equipo semanales para compartir aprendizajes y fomentar la colaboración.
Te reunirás directamente con el cliente para presentar avances, resolver dudas y entender mejor sus necesidades.




¿Qué ofrecemos?




Contrato indefinido y salario entre los 36.000 y 38.000 euros brutos/año de entrada, ajustado según tu experiencia (nuestro plan de carrera incluye 2 revisiones anuales). También tendrás a tu disposición un plan de formación especializado, participación en la propiedad y los beneficios de Mática: Wetaca gratuito en la oficina dos días a la semana, horario flexible con facilidades para trabajar desde donde quieras, seguro de salud, retribución flexible con Cobee, además de las vacaciones habituales, ofrecemos una semana extra en Navidad y tres días adicionales en Semana Santa. También recibirás un divertido Welcome Kit con portátil (podrás escoger entre varios modelos Mac o Windows), móvil, botella personalizada, auriculares bluetooth y golosinas.

Cuando estés en nuestra oficina, en el centro de Barcelona o Madrid, la fruta, los cafés y los refrescos corren a cuenta de Mática. ¡Ah! Y si eres amante de los animales, te gustará saber esto: ¡nuestras oficinas son Pet-friendly!




Si te interesa, escríbenos por LinkedIn o envía tu CV a anna.garriga@maticapartners.com




Do you want to be Mática? Be Mática!

Show more

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Job description: ZF Aftermarket is seeking a Data Scientist for its Customer Strategy & Commercial Excellence department, located in Barcelona’s 22@ innovation district. The company is expanding its advanced analytics capabilities, focusing on data-driven solutions in the rapidly evolving mobility sector. 

We invite you to watch the following keynote speech from our Vice President outlining ZF’s exciting new strategy in this space: Keynote Speech

What you can look forward to as Data Scientist:

Prototype Development: Create advanced analytics models for marketing, sales, pricing, and logistics.
Modeling Cycle: Understand business problems, explore data, create and test models, and iterate until the solution is business-ready.
Collaboration: Work closely with business analysts and stakeholders to improve models and provide actionable insights.

 

 

Profile description:

Your profile as Data Scientist:

Strong background in computing and statistics.
Experience with Python, R, Pyspark, and models such as neural networks and Bayesian modeling.
Familiarity with databases (e.g., Oracle, AWS) and big data platforms (e.g., Databricks, GCP).
Knowledge of visualization tools (e.g., Power BI, Tableau).
Soft skills like teamwork, business acumen, and data storytelling are essential.

 

 

We offer:

Why you should choose ZF in Barcelona?

Work-Life Balance: Flexible hours and a modern office environment in Barcelona.
Career Growth: Continuous learning and mentoring programs.
Collaborative Culture: Emphasis on teamwork and knowledge sharing.

 

The role is hybrid, requiring 3-4 days of presence at the Wojo office per week.

Show more
HTML:
Job description: ZF Aftermarket is seeking a Data Scientist for its Customer Strategy & Commercial Excellence department, located in Barcelona’s 22@ innovation district. The company is expanding its advanced analytics capabilities, focusing on data-driven solutions in the rapidly evolving mobility sector. 

We invite you to watch the following keynote speech from our Vice President outlining ZF’s exciting new strategy in this space: Keynote Speech

What you can look forward to as Data Scientist:

  • Prototype Development: Create advanced analytics models for marketing, sales, pricing, and logistics.
  • Modeling Cycle: Understand business problems, explore data, create and test models, and iterate until the solution is business-ready.
  • Collaboration: Work closely with business analysts and stakeholders to improve models and provide actionable insights.

 

 

Profile description:

Your profile as Data Scientist:

  • Strong background in computing and statistics.
  • Experience with Python, R, Pyspark, and models such as neural networks and Bayesian modeling.
  • Familiarity with databases (e.g., Oracle, AWS) and big data platforms (e.g., Databricks, GCP).
  • Knowledge of visualization tools (e.g., Power BI, Tableau).
  • Soft skills like teamwork, business acumen, and data storytelling are essential.

 

 

We offer:

Why you should choose ZF in Barcelona?

  • Work-Life Balance: Flexible hours and a modern office environment in Barcelona.
  • Career Growth: Continuous learning and mentoring programs.
  • Collaborative Culture: Emphasis on teamwork and knowledge sharing.

 

The role is hybrid, requiring 3-4 days of presence at the Wojo office per week.

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Location: Barcelona, in-office

At SumUp, we are passionate about giving access to financial services to the millions of businesses too small for most providers to consider. What started as one card reader has turned into a range of readers and multiple remote payment solutions, as well as banking services, including Business Accounts and Loans.

As a Data Scientist in the Lending Tribe, you will play with a huge dataset with billions of transactions from millions of active users. From there, you will build impactful models to help businesses across multiple countries get access to credit through SumUp’s different lending products. You’ll be part of a team of talented analysts, engineers, and other scientists using an advanced stack of tools to create innovative solutions for our products.

What you will do:


Improve the core lending models: credit risk scoring and affordability forecasting models using machine learning solutions
Define data collection strategies and new algorithms for models to support expansion to new market segments
Perform analyses and present your insights to enable SumUp business teams to make data-driven, mission-critical decisions (DROP)
Communicate and present results to product and business stakeholders
Mentor other Data Scientists to pursue data science excellence through good engineering practices
Build production-grade ML solutions using Python, scikit-learn, LightGBM, and PySpark—delivered with testing, monitoring, and reproducibility baked in
Navigate and improve legacy code and pipelines—refactor without fear, stabilise what’s brittle, and raise engineering standards across the board
Clearly communicate trade-offs and model performance to both technical and business stakeholders


You will be great for this position if you have:


Solid understanding of Data Science
Deep Python skills, including experience with (pandas, scikit-learn)
Solid SQL knowledge
Mastery of statistics, machine learning, and probability theory
Proven track record in delivering solutions end-to-end
Experience deploying machine learning models and artifacts in production at scale
Excellent technical reading, writing and communication skills to support stakeholder management


Big Plus:


Hands-on experience building or maintaining credit risk models in regulated environments
A background in software engineering—you think in modules, write testable code, and care about long-term maintainability
Experience launching models in data-constrained or new market environments
A degree in a quantitative field: Data Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Economics, or similar


Why you should join SumUp:


Opportunity to work with SumUppers globally on large-scale fintech products used by millions of businesses worldwide, from our Berlin office. This involves an office-first setup
Restaurant tickets (powered by Edenred)
Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion: Be part of a workplace that values and promotes diversity, fostering an inclusive environment where everyone's perspectives are respected and embraced
A dedicated annual L&D budget of €2000 for attending conferences and/or advancing your career through further education
30 Days Sabbatical: Enjoy the unique opportunity to take a well-deserved break with our 30 days sabbatical benefit after completing 3 years of employment with SumUp
Referral Bonus: Earn additional rewards by referring talented individuals to join the SumUp team


About SumUp

We believe in the everyday hero.

Small business owners are at the heart of all we do, so we create powerful, easy-to-use financial solutions to help them run their businesses. With a founder’s mentality and a 'team-first’ attitude, our diverse teams across Europe, South America and the United States work together to ensure that the small business owners we partner with can be successful doing what they love.

SumUp is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer that proudly pursues and hires a diverse workforce. SumUp does not make hiring or employment decisions on the basis of race, colour, religion or religious belief, ethnic or national origin, nationality, sex, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability, age or any other basis protected by applicable laws or prohibited by company policy. SumUp also strives for a healthy and safe workplace and strictly prohibits harassment of any kind.

SumUp will not accept unsolicited resumes from any source other than directly from a candidate.

Job Application Tip

We recognise that candidates feel they need to meet 100% of the job criteria in order to apply for a job. Please note that this is only a guide. If you don’t tick every box, it’s ok too because it means you have room to learn and develop your career at SumUp.
Show more

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Smadex is a leading advertising technology company founded in Barcelona in 2011 and sold to American-based and stock-listed Entravision in 2018 (NYSE::EVC). We are one of the top mobile ad-tech companies in the world and the largest Demand Side Platform (DSP) based in Europe, with our revenues over +$100M and consistently growing +40% YoY over the past years.

We compete in a highly advanced technology-driven industry where Machine Learning and cutting-edge cloud-based big data architectures are the biggest factor in achieving the company’s growth.

Our mission is to continue to improve our ad-tech platform to help our clients achieve their programmatic advertising campaign goals, and we want to give our employees a job they’ll love, where they will be challenged to improve results through real-life engineering and data analysis and where everyone’s implication has an impact.

Are you ready to be part of the new unicorn? Keep reading!

What will you do:

You will be part of all the major architectural decisions and developments we make on our algorithms, especially in our state-of-the-art deep learning models.
You will be responsible for proposing and developing new models, measuring the performance and improving our algorithms. Our ML Engineer role combines the classic "ML Scientist" and "Data Engineer" role at other companies
You will also play an analytical role researching, designing, implementing, and deploying full-stack scalable data analytics and machine learning solutions to challenge business issues, as well as working closely with our Tech and Ops team
You will work on unique modeling challenges not covered in the scientific literature, like extreme positive sample sparsity and labeling delay.
Analyse data from different sources and provide actionable insights to business and engineering stakeholders
Please note that we do NOT provide VISA sponsorship. Candidates without a legal permit to work in Spain won't be considered.

What you need to have:

Very strong coding ability in at least one of the following: Python, Scala, Java
Knowledge of Bitbucket/Git version tools
Experience in machine learning and predictive modelling: deep neural networks, logistic regression, clustering and time series analysis & auto-regressive models
Knowledge of advanced statistical techniques and concepts (regression, properties of distributions, statistical significance tests)
Experience working with SQL and data warehousing
Problem solving oriented mentality and a very proactive approach
Self-motivated with the ability to work independently and sense of accountability
Detail-oriented, well organized, and able to multi-task in a results-oriented business environment
Excellent communication skills both verbal and written
Fluency in English.

Extra points for :-)

Master’s degree in Machine Learning, AI, Statistics, Applied mathematics, Computer Science
Proficiency in building high-performance algorithms in production
Experience with transformer architectures and LLMs.
Experience with reporting and data visualization tools such as Jupyter Notebook, Zeppelin, Tableau, Periscope, PowerBI or others
Experience in digital marketing platforms and user acquisition
Experience with and Apache Spark and Nodejs programming language
Familiarity with AWS services such as EMR, EC2, Athena, S3, Redshift
Used to Linux environments

Reward package:

Integrate a highly motivated and young team
Great compensation package
Top location at the heart of Barcelona in a penthouse office with a rooftop terrace, Barbeque, and a fully stocked fridge
Great work-life balance: 2 days working from home, flexible hours
LinkedIn Learning and training opportunities
Meal vouchers - Tickets Restaurant monthly allowance
Monthly gym allowance to use in up to 30 DIR gyms around the city
Monthly TGIF events
Regular team-building events
Fun and friendly work environment with talented marketers and engineers from over 21 countries
And more!
Show more

Title: DATA SCIENTIST AND MACHINE LEARNING ENGINEER (OPTIMIZATION)
Description:
Eurecat is the main Research & Technology Organisation in Catalonia and the second largest private research organization in southern Europe. It brings together the experience of more than 800 professionals and provides services to more than 2,000 companies. Applied R&D, technological services, highly specialized training, technological consultancy or valorisation and exploitation of industrial property are some of the services that Eurecat offers for both large and small and medium-sized enterprises in all sectors. The technology centre participates in more than 200 large national and international consortium projects of high strategic R&I and has 181 patents and 10 spin-offs. The added value provided by Eurecat accelerates innovation, reduces spending on scientific and technological infrastructures, reduces risks and provides specialized knowledge tailored to each company.

Job Description

Are you ready to embark on a challenging journey of discovering and applying novel optimization-based solutions different industrial and logistics applications? The Applied Artificial Intelligence Unit of EURECAT is looking for a highly motivated Operations Research specialist to help us pave the way in transforming how goods are manufactured and transported for a more sustainable future.


Whether it’s algorithms or data analytics, we’re here to revolutionize the logistics and industrial sector.
Improve processes and operations by developing cutting edge data driven solutions
Multicriteria optimization solutions to face the day-to-day challenges in real world applications. Let’s help businesses to streamline their process and boost their efficiency
Collaboration: Join our multidisciplinary team. Learn, grow, and contribute. Be part of data-driven revolution



Responsabilities

As a valued member of our team, your role encompasses several critical dimensions:


Multi-Criteria and Multi-Objective optimization for Logistics and Industrial applications: from production planning and scheduling to optimal transport allocation and route planning
Eager to challenge the status-quo: work and develop novel solutions mixing ML and Optimization.
Think big: Reinforcement Learning, Robust Optimization and SoA solutions
Code Craftsmanship: Your code will be the bedrock of our innovations. Rigorous validation and refinement ensure optimal efficiency and ready-to market solutions
Innovative Solutions: You’ll delve into the intricate world of data-driven solutions, harnessing the power of multimodal data across different contexts.
Global Impact: Collaborate on scientific publications, sharing your insights with the wider research community.
Tailored Growth: We recognize your unique strengths and interests. Your responsibilities will evolve accordingly, fostering personalized development within our team.
Project Leadership: As you grow and the projects unfold, your adept project management skills will steer us toward success.



WHAT EURECAT CAN OFFER YOU?

Our group is specialized in applied research and development on ML, optimization and AI solutions. The Applied Artificial Intelligence Unit of Eurecat develops innovative solutions (algorithms, methods, platforms) based on a combination of artificial intelligence and knowledge management technologies, especially for the industrial, energy and sustainability sectors. We have over 12 years of experience pushing the adoption of state-of-the-art AI and ML solutions for our private customers as well as for relevant European research projects! Check out our portfolio: Applied Artificial Intelligence - Eurecat (applied-artificial-intelligence-eurecat.github.io) Applied Artificial Intelligence Eurecat Technological Centre

And …


Permanent contract
Hybrid (work home office/work in the office)
Flexible Schedule
Shorter workday on Friday and Summer Schedule
Flexible remuneration package (health insurance, transport, lunch, studies - training and kindergarten)
Eurecat workers can join the Eurecat Academy courses
Eurecat workers can attend our weekly thematic sessions to be aware of Eurecat areas of knowledge.
Language’s training (English, Catalan and Spanish)
Company's commitment to work-life balance



Requirements:

Required Skills


A passion for Operation Research and data driven based solutions, backed by an MSc or equivalent experience in Multi-criteria optimization, Mathematics, ML and AI.
Excellent coding skills. Your code will be used in ready-to-market AI applications.
Experience in Linear programming, Metaheuristics (PSO, Ant Colony, etc)
Proficiency in Python.
At least 2 years of hands-on experience with Operation Research challenges.
Open minded: Eager to learn new domains: how the transport sector works, and how industrial processes work, and how industries work, seeking efficiency.
A collaborative and growing mindset, coupled with the ability to thrive both independently and as part of a team.
Dynamic communication skills allowing you to effectively convey complex ideas and collaborate with colleagues from diverse backgrounds.
Flexibility, creativity, and a relentless drive to innovate.
Critical thinking.
A readiness to travel when needed, embracing opportunities to connect with clients, partners, and collaborators.
Show more

Title: Machine Learning Engineer / Data Scientist
Description:
🌐 Híbrido en Barcelona

⌛ Tiempo completo

👨‍💻 Nivel Senior

Sobre INNOIT

En INNOIT, nos especializamos en la gestión de carreras profesionales en el ámbito de la tecnología de la información. Somos una consultora tecnológica y digital con sede en España, contamos con un equipo de más de 200 profesionales del sector y llevamos más de seis años participando en la transformación digital de destacadas empresas a nivel nacional e internacional.

Descripción Del Trabajo

✅ Responsabilidades:


Diseñar y desarrollar soluciones innovadoras de IA/ML en colaboración con el Centro de Excelencia OneAI
Desarrollar arquitectura de sistemas, hojas de ruta técnicas y prototipos
Construir, probar e implementar modelos de IA en producción aprovechando los servicios de AWS
Explorar continuamente nuevas técnicas y metodologías de IA para impulsar la innovación


👍 Tu Perfil


+4 años de experiencia en la arquitectura y el desarrollo de sistemas de IA/ML, +1 año de experiencia con sistemas GenAI
Experiencia en Python (4 años), SQL, PyTorch, TensorFlow y otras bibliotecas/marcos de ML
Experiencia en AI Generativa
Experiencia en la implementación de soluciones en plataformas en la nube como AWS. Familiaridad con los principios de MLOps y AIOps.
Es deseable contar con experiencia en Databricks
Experiencia en el desarrollo de proyectos empleando modelos de Deep Learning (Librerías Tensorflow o PyTorch). Se valora experiencia entrenando o haciendo fine tuning de LLM en casos reales.
Experiencia en prototipar soluciones basadas en Machine Learning
Marco metodológico Agile/Scrum
Castellano e inglés alto


🚀 Lo Que Te Ofrecemos

⏱ Horarios flexibles

💰 Salario competitivo + retribución flexible

🩺 Seguro médico

🎓 Formaciones técnicas y no técnicas

📚 Cursos de idiomas

🤓 Comunidades tecnológicas

🔄 Seguimiento continuo

🚀 Trayectoria profesional

Únete al equipo InnoIT, desarrolla tu talento en IT, aprende, crea y diviértete!

Te estamos esperando 😊así que si quieres saberlo todo, ¡contáctanos ya!

Si quieres conocernos más, puedes visitar nuestra web y nuestra app de Meetup:

👉https://www.inno-it.es/

👉Meetup De InnoIT Consulting En Barcelona

https://www.meetup.com/es-ES/Meetup-de-InnoIT-Consulting-en-Barcelona/?_locale=es-ES

👉Meetup De InnoIT Consulting En Madrid

https://www.meetup.com/es-ES/meetup-de-innoit-consulting-en-madrid/



Te lo hemos contado, aunque mejor vivirlo en primera persona

En InnoIT, promovemos activamente la diversidad, la equidad y la inclusión. Invitamos a personas de todos los orígenes y experiencias a aplicar, y valoramos especialmente las candidaturas de mujeres y otros grupos subrepresentados en el sector tecnológico. Evaluamos todas las solicitudes de manera equitativa y estamos comprometidos a realizar los ajustes necesarios para garantizar un proceso de selección justo y un entorno de trabajo inclusivo. No discriminamos por género, edad, origen étnico, nacionalidad, orientación sexual, identidad de género, religión, discapacidad o cualquier otra característica protegida por la ley.

  • Experiencia en Python (4 años), SQL, PyTorch, TensorFlow y otras bibliotecas/marcos de ML
  • Experiencia en AI Generativa
  • Experiencia en la implementación de soluciones en plataformas en la nube como AWS. Familiaridad con los principios de MLOps y AIOps.
  • Es deseable contar con experiencia en Databricks
  • Experiencia en el desarrollo de proyectos empleando modelos de Deep Learning (Librerías Tensorflow o PyTorch). Se valora experiencia entrenando o haciendo fine tuning de LLM en casos reales.
  • Experiencia en prototipar soluciones basadas en Machine Learning
  • Marco metodológico Agile/Scrum
  • Castellano e inglés alto

🚀 Lo Que Te Ofrecemos

⏱ Horarios flexibles

💰 Salario competitivo + retribución flexible

🩺 Seguro médico

🎓 Formaciones técnicas y no técnicas

📚 Cursos de idiomas

🤓 Comunidades tecnológicas

🔄 Seguimiento continuo

🚀 Trayectoria profesional

Únete al equipo InnoIT, desarrolla tu talento en IT, aprende, crea y diviértete!

Te estamos esperando 😊así que si quieres saberlo todo, ¡contáctanos ya!

Si quieres conocernos más, puedes visitar nuestra web y nuestra app de Meetup:

👉https://www.inno-it.es/

👉Meetup De InnoIT Consulting En Barcelona

https://www.meetup.com/es-ES/Meetup-de-InnoIT-Consulting-en-Barcelona/?_locale=es-ES

👉Meetup De InnoIT Consulting En Madrid

https://www.meetup.com/es-ES/meetup-de-innoit-consulting-en-madrid/



Te lo hemos contado, aunque mejor vivirlo en primera persona

En InnoIT, promovemos activamente la diversidad, la equidad y la inclusión. Invitamos a personas de todos los orígenes y experiencias a aplicar, y valoramos especialmente las candidaturas de mujeres y otros grupos subrepresentados en el sector tecnológico. Evaluamos todas las solicitudes de manera equitativa y estamos comprometidos a realizar los ajustes necesarios para garantizar un proceso de selección justo y un entorno de trabajo inclusivo. No discriminamos por género, edad, origen étnico, nacionalidad, orientación sexual, identidad de género, religión, discapacidad o cualquier otra característica protegida por la ley.

Title: Data Scientist Optimization
Description:
Hello! We are Volotea, the airline of small and mid-sized cities in Europe.

Join our Data Science Team  and turn advanced optimization algorithms into real-world impact across multiple departments. You’ll build and maintain optimization algorithms, machine learning models, forecasting tools and data driven experiments that directly enhance operations, strategy, and more.

This is an incredible opportunity to combine your analytical and technical skills with creativity, to solve complex problems, collaborate with diverse teams, and make a real impact on our growth.


🚀 Take off with us! Your journey starts here.

How will it be to work with us?

- Design, build & refine optimization models: Develop metaheuristic algorithms (simulated annealing, constraint programming, etc.) and explore mathematical‑programming approaches.

- From prototype to production: Write clean, tested Python, review peers’ code; deploy services through our CI/CD pipeline.

- Monitor & improve performance: Profile algorithms, tune parameters, track KPIs, and ship incremental improvements.

- Expand beyond optimization: Take on projects in forecasting, experimentation design, causal inference, or ML as business needs evolve.

- Collaborate & Communicate: Work closely with operations, scheduling, finance and IT teams to turn data and constraints into actionable solutions.

- Stay ahead of trends: Apply new industry methods and academic research to enhance workflows and processes.

Why join us?

✈️ Travel the world for less

Enjoy exclusive deals with 180+ airlines—fly with your family for up to 4-5 times less than standard fares, just covering airport taxes. Weekend getaways or global adventures? You decide!

🏙 A prime location in Barcelona – And no, we’re not located at the airport!

You may not have seen us at Barcelona Airport, but there’s a reason for that—you’ll understand when you get to know us! 😉 Our HQ is in a top area, surrounded by great restaurants, shops, and services.

🤝 We work hard, but we have fun too!

We love bringing people together with events like:🎭 Carnival parties 🎢 Trips to Port Aventura 🎿 Ski getaways 🏃 Running clubs 🏓 Paddle & ping-pong tournaments

We’re an active, social team—there’s always something happening!

⚡ Make an impact – Bring your ideas to life! 🚀

At Volotea, your ideas matter. We give you the space and support to create, innovate, and shape the company’s future.

📝 A benefits plan that works for you

Customize your benefits! Allocate part of your salary to dining, transport, or health insurance, tax-free—meaning more savings for the things you love!

🧘‍♀️ Your well-being comes first

Enjoy discounted gym memberships, free fresh fruit, and coffee to keep you energized.

🌍 A global teamwork

In a diverse, multicultural environment where teamwork and innovation drive success.

📈 Grow your career with us

Access training in soft skills, office tools, and languages to boost your career.

⚖ Work-Life balance – Flexibility to thrive

With flexible schedules, hybrid work, flexible vacations, and your birthday off, you can grow professionally without compromising your well-being.


🚀 Ready to join us?


What will make you succeed in this position:

Degree in a quantitative field (like Statistics, Mathematics, Physics, Engineering, or Computer Science), and you’re eager to apply that knowledge in practical, business-driven ways.

1+ year of hands-on experience in optimization, data science, operations research, machine learning, or software development — and you’re looking for your next challenge.

You write clean, well-structured Python code, and you care about quality, testing, and writing code that lasts.

Comfortable working with SQL and relational databases to dig into the data and uncover insights.

You're a creative problem solver — you enjoy exploring new approaches, tuning models, and iterating to find what works best.

You can explain complex ideas clearly and work well with non-technical teams — because you know that collaboration is key to turning data into action.

Fluency on English and Spanish, and you’re confident navigating bilingual environments.

🛠️ Our tech stack

Python (anaconda, uv, pandas, polars, NumPy, SciPy, scikit‑learn, LightGBM, shap, mlflow, optuna, jupyter, matplotlib, seaborn, streamlit, Flask, SQLAlchemy, pytest, etc.) · GitHub (git, ruff, pre‑commit) · VS Code & PyCharm · Docker · PostgreSQL, Redshift & Delta Lake · PySpark · DataBricks · Azure & AWS · Power BI

VOLOTEA | Jobs and Careers

VOLOTEA | Vuelos baratos, ofertas y billetes de avión a ciudades de toda Europa.




Listen to our Top Management introduce our culture at Volotea.


Volotea is an equal opportunity employer that values diversity and inclusion and strives to recruit diverse candidates. Our goal is to continuously improve and sustain an inclusive culture by attracting, developing, and engaging the best talent in our industry.


Data Privacy

Please read our Data Privacy Policy here.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Tus tareas

Hola Consultores, S.L. es una empresa especializada en la provisión de Servicios TIC e Ingeniería para la gestión empresarial, ofreciendo soluciones diseñadas a medida de las necesidades de nuestros clientes.

Nos enorgullece ser una empresa 2.0 innovadora donde las personas son el centro de nuestra atención. La ética, transparencia, imparcialidad e independencia son valores fundamentales en nuestra filosofía, y también estamos comprometidos con la igualdad de género. Nos esforzamos por garantizar oportunidades equitativas para hombres y mujeres en todas las áreas de nuestro trabajo. Además, estamos firmemente a favor de la igualdad en todas sus formas y promovemos un entorno inclusivo donde cada individuo, independientemente de su género, religión, orientación sexual, etnia o cualquier otra característica, sea valorado y respetado.

Tu perfil

¡Estamos en la búsqueda de perfiles Machine Learning Engineer!

ROL: Asumirás las tareas propias de MLE en el despliegue y circuito CI/CD de nuevos modelos, monitorización y re-entrenamiento de modelos.

Serás un perfil que deberás asumir un gran conocimiento técnico y funcional de las aplicaciones del área actuales y futuras. Participarás en los proyectos del área como persona técnica de referencia y en la definición de los procedimientos y metodologías de Desarrollo.

Conocimientos Requeridos


ML architectures (laboratory, training and inference)
CI/CD for ML
Jenkins, GitHub, CodeArtifact
Monitoring: drift, performance, infra (knowledge of tools will be valued: fluentd, New
Relic)
Experience in developing ML models
Development in Python (will be valued: Scikit learn, Gunicorn, Django)
Dockerized development
SQL
Experiencia en entorno AWS y/o AZURE.


Se Valorará


AWS Batch
AWS EKS
Step Functions
SageMaker
CloudFormation
RDS PostgreSQL
SQS
Lambda


¿Por qué nosotros?

Beneficios


Contrato laboral indefinido y estabilidad desde el primer día.
Todo nuestro apoyo para tu desarrollo personal/profesional.
Jornada laboral hibrida.
Incorporación inmediata.
Excelente clima laboral.
Seguro médico privado con Adeslas (completo + dental).
Pago del 100% exámenes de certificación oficial.
Pago parcial de cualquier curso de IT/Data.
✔Grandes proyectos con tecnologías avanzadas.


¡Únete a nuestro equipo! ¡En Hola Consultores apostamos por ti!

¿Quiénes somos?

Hola, somos una Consultoría de Barcelona especializada en la selección, desarrollo y búsqueda de talento humano.

Misión

El desarrollo y la excelencia profesional en la gestión de los Recursos Humanos implementando soluciones enfocadas a la consecución de objetivos concretos.

Visión

Agilizamos los procesos aportando las capacidades tecnológicas adecuadas para la mejora continua de las empresas.

Estrategia

Consultoría estratégica con un relevante sentido práctico identificando las necesidades y aplicando soluciones e medida.
